summary: This is an email from a Human Resource Manager at MCC New York regarding a memorandum to be issued to Michael Thomas, restricting him to the first floor of the facility. The document involves administrative procedures for managing an individual's access within the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Michael Thomas
persons.context: He is the recipient of a memorandum restricting him to the first floor of the MCC New York facility.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: Referred to as 'Mr. Thomas' in the email, he is to be issued a memorandum regarding access restrictions.

connections.description: The HR manager is issuing an administrative memorandum to Michael Thomas regarding his access restrictions.

events.title: Access Restriction Memorandum Issued
events.description: A memorandum is issued to Michael Thomas restricting him to the first floor of MCC New York.

keyFacts: Michael Thomas was subject to access restrictions at MCC New York, limited to the first floor.
The document is dated August 12, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and during his incarceration at MCC New York.
The correspondence involves administrative procedures for managing an inmate or individual's movement within the correctional facility.
